page.title: 0822nd June Local Fayre & News
page.content: The day, following{Midsummers {Day,}was one of the wettest days in June.{Saturday 22nd was the Crowthorne {C of E Schools Summer Fayre. Early in the morning people set up their stalls inside the school, because of the rain. Articles for sale on the{White Elephant and Plant stall were priced. Some children organised side shows{e.g.Jack Box, Pick an Egg, {Ping Pong Ball, Chopsticks and {Peanuts,Pick-a-straw and Steady Hand. Kimberley and Jule ran a stall called {Pick an Egg,}they raised Â£8-10. For their stall they needed lots of empty eggshells, which the class had been collecting. To organise their stall they put a box filled with sawdust on the table and put about 20 eggshells in it. They put a sticker in 5 of the eggs. You could win a packet of refreshers if you found a sticker.
